Name: Notifications of suspended or revoked asbestos certifications.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notifications of suspended or revoked asbestos certifications.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Environmental Protection

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1. Subdivision d of section 24-146.1 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new paragraph 8 to read as follows:
(8) Upon the suspension or revocation of a certification issued pursuant to this section, the commissioner shall notify the New York state department of labor, the New York city department of health and mental hygiene and shall notify such other governmental agencies as the commissioner determines are appropriate of such suspension or revocation and the circumstances thereof.
	Â§ 2. This local law shall take effect ninety days after enactment.
